attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
29th February is a day we work but do not get for, except if you work for the National Trust, who give their staff the day off, as they acknowledge that they are not paying them for this extra day.
Why should we work an extra day for our employers for no wages?

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FreedayFriday/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
